bibl.title: Letter from Clarissa [s.n.] to Mabel H. Lazear, March 28, [19--]

div1.p: Clarissa provides news about family and friends. She comments on the movie “Yellow Jack.”

div1.head: Letter from Clarissa [s.n.] to Mabel H. Lazear, March 28, [19--]
div1.opener:
Now
be fond
& write
me -- & Send
me some
of your
sunshine
& a whiff
of freesia!
Affectionately
Clarissa
MRS. MORGAN JONES
35 EAST 76TH STREET
NEW YORK CITY
March 28th
Mabel dear-
div1.p:
I fully intended to
Sit down at my desk
after Christmas & write you
- then surely when I sent
you the Subscription to “News
Week” - which Sherman is doing
the advertising for - & here
it is almost Easter - and
your letter, which was most
welcome has caused my
ears to turn a delicate
shade of magenta!!

I am so glad, first of
all that you do like “News
Week” - for Sherman - plus
a dozen others, all about his
age, raised the money for it,
& are doing the whole thing.

At the end of one year
they had 75,000 subscribers,
which, according to Statistics
is quite remarkable. It's
hard sledding in these
times - & Sherman says he
MRS. MORGAN JONES
35 EAST 76TH STREET
NEW YORK CITY
hasn't time to think of a
wife - but I am so glad
that he is busy - & likes
his job. New York is such
a gloom these days - with
all the new stock market
rulings - many of our friends
are going to be out of luck-
& nobody seems to know
just where we are going to
end. Morgan hasn't been
well this past year - due
as much as anything to
worry - & with all our
investments gone to pot - it
doesn't look very cheery for
any more trips for awhile-
so we'll just have to stay
here & wait developments.

We are on the 28th floor
of the “Carlyle” - with good
air - a grand view of
the Park - & floods of sun-
shine (when there is any!) so it's
a good summer resort.
And we haven't been
away for nearly four years!
We have all our own furniture
MRS. MORGAN JONES
35 EAST 76TH STREET
NEW YORK CITY
about us - and a cute
little spick & span kitchenette
So when Hotel meals pall
we can have a maid come
in. In the intervals Sherman
is a grand cook -- really
he can do anything from broil-
ing a lobster & making waffles-
and I am strong on salads-
So we're very cosy & it gives
me a rest from housekeeping.

I was so interested to
hear that Houston had
succumbed, at last, and I'm
so glad you like the girl.

Doesn't it seem a century
ago that we had small
infants in San Francisco!

I hear from Sister Helen
now & then. Her life seems
peaceful, at least. Henrietta
still lives in Florence - &
with the bologny dollar
at 54 cents, she is finding
it a bit difficult - but
give me poverty in Florence
rather than anywhere over
here.! She often asks for you

It doesn't seem possible that
your Mother & Jane have gone
MRS. MORGAN JONES
35 EAST 76TH STREET
NEW YORK CITY
since we saw you last-
and then Phil's death
followed Mother's in three
years. & two years later
Agnes died - so now I
have no one in this Country
belonging to me really, except
Sherman & Morgan. I envy you
being in Santa Barbara.
I always loved it better
than any other spot, &
I am sure you are doing
nice things with a garden.
Do you ever see Adah Cooper?
give her my love when you do,
& write me about her & all
the other things I'll love to hear.
Is Peggy in Berkeley still, or
in Santa Barbara. The other day
I went with a scientifically
minded friend (a very interesting
woman) to see “Yellow Jack”
and was tremendously im-
pressed by it. It was so
beautifully handled - the
action sincere - the lighting
& off stage singing kept one
continually in the spirit of
1900 - and the whole thing
such sermon in the patience
MRS. MORGAN JONES
35 EAST 76TH STREET
NEW YORK CITY
it requires for any scientific
research to see its reward.
It begins in London - in 1927
showing that the Doctors there
were reaping the benefits of
the sacrifices made in Cuba
so long ago! Dr Lazear is
the real hero - of the play-
a dynamic role - You could
never bear to see it - but
I reached out my hand to
you across the Continent
when taps were sounded
and said to myself - “No'
it was not waste.”-
It would make you very
proud indeed to see him
34 years later - the living
hero of a great achievement

I am sending you the
programme. We all send
love - & Sherman is so
delighted that his baby
appeals to you. They have had
many compliments on their veracity
accuracy and the smartness of
their condensed news of the day.
